constantValues: An Expenditure represents an amount of money spent by an Organization or Delivery Framework.

definitions.description: An Expenditure represents an amount of money spent by an Organization or Delivery Framework.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

members.description: Reason for the status of the Expenditure

members.name: name

constantValues: The name of the custom entity.

members.description: The name of the custom entity.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: deliveryFrameworkId

constantValues: Unique identifier for Delivery Framework associated with Expenditure.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier for Delivery Framework associated with Expenditure.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: disbursementChannelId

constantValues: The channel through which the funds will flow for this transaction.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The channel through which the funds will flow for this transaction.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: financeTypeId

constantValues: The type of finance (e.g. grant, loan, debt relief, etc.).

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The type of finance (e.g. grant, loan, debt relief, etc.).

foreignKeyAttribute.name: flowTypeId

constantValues: Whether the transaction is funded by Official Development Assistance (ODA), Other Official Flows (OOF), etc.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Whether the transaction is funded by Official Development Assistance (ODA), Other Official Flows (OOF), etc.

members.name: humanitarian

constantValues: Indicates that this transaction relates entirely or partially to humanitarian aid.

members.description: Indicates that this transaction relates entirely or partially to humanitarian aid.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: organizationId

constantValues: Unique identifier for Account associated with Expenditure.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier for Account associated with Expenditure.

members.name: providerActivityIdentifier

constantValues: If incoming funds are being provided from the budget of another activity, record the activity's unique identifier.

members.description: If incoming funds are being provided from the budget of another activity, record the activity's unique identifier.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: providerOrganizationId

constantValues: The organization from which the transaction originated.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The organization from which the transaction originated.

members.name: recipientActivityIdentifier

constantValues: If outgoing funds are being provided to another activity, record the activity's unique identifier.

members.description: If outgoing funds are being provided to another activity, record the activity's unique identifier.

members.name: recipientCountryDescription

constantValues: A description of the recipient country.

members.description: A description of the recipient country.

constantValues: A country that will benefit from this transaction.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: A country that will benefit from this transaction.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: recipientOrganizationId

constantValues: The organization receiving the money from the transaction.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The organization receiving the money from the transaction.

members.name: recipientRegionDescription

constantValues: A description of the recipient region.

members.description: A description of the recipient region.

constantValues: A region that will benefit from this transaction.
